summary: The diff does not implement the requested hero/header image swaps or add the required static image assets; it only updates project_state.json metadata and references unrelated backend readiness issues.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing hero/header images used at the top of each main tab with more visually appealing, clean, modern-day images while keeping the same image filenames and dimensions currently referenced by the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend UI files or image assets were modified/added; only project_state.json was changed, so the hero/header images cannot be updated in the UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the updated hero/header image files as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, matching the exact filenames referenced by the HeroHeader usage in each tab.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated (no added files at all), so the required header image assets are not present.

hallucinated_features.description: Tracking or prioritizing a backend readiness/add-task issue as part of this change (e.g., marking as a fix request, mentioning backend not ready).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states the backend must remain unchanged and that fixing the 'backup backend is not ready' / add-task readiness issue is a non-goal, yet project metadata emphasizes this backend issue.
